revised_title: Revisiting Osmosis in Leaky Pores: Debunking Surface Pressures
tldr: The author challenges the concept of surface pressures in osmotic flow through leaky pores, arguing that it is incompatible with the Boltzmann equation and experimental observations. They demonstrate that osmotic flow is purely diffusive, and that hydraulic and osmotic flow have distinct mechanisms, refuting the idea of reciprocal relations between them.
